text: The Tangkap Najib rally, also called the #TangkapNajib Protest, was a demonstration in Kuala Lumpur on August 1, 2015. A youth activist group called Demi Malaysia organized the peaceful rally. They wanted Prime Minister of Malaysia Najib Razak to resign because of the 1Malaysia Development Berhad scandal. This rally was one of the first protests to directly pressure the Prime Minister to resign due to his involvement in the 1MDB scandal. Category:Politics of Malaysia Category:2010s protests
title: Tangkap Najib rally
